scripts.fonts:download: curl -o fonts/fonts.zip https://kamichikoichi.github.io/jigmo/Jigmo-20230816.zip && unzip -o fonts/fonts.zip -d fonts && rm fonts/fonts.zip
scripts.fonts:compile: woff2_compress fonts/Jigmo-20230816/Jigmo.ttf && woff2_compress fonts/Jigmo-20230816/Jigmo2.ttf && woff2_compress fonts/Jigmo-20230816/Jigmo3.ttf && mv fonts/Jigmo-20230816/*.woff2 static/fonts
